title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Defining Sociology of Architecture as a sub-field of Sociology, the element of society (inequalities, institutions, society and change), theoretical perspectives and methodologies relevant to sociology of Architecture.Built Spaces and socio-cultural reality, built spaces and marginal groups, built spaces and power, gender and built spaces, spaces in continuity and change.
